body:
Imagine, an onee san pampering you...
But you know it's impossible so you go to the corner of your room and cry.
All according to the plan hehehe
At least Onee san milk is full fat 🥛
Its not always of who you want but who you need and Everyone needs an Onee san
I mean ey good for him, he was the romantic type and got a girl that likes that

Nice this is the feel good stuff and make yourself sad because it’s not you I also thought it was funny that he said he wouldn’t do SFX but all the little ones like stroke~ wet~ and spurt~ we’re all translated all of them
Need more chapter what happen to Mao and Yuji, Yutaro and Oneesan
FUCK YEAH THIS IS WHOLESOME i just hope the other chapters are wholesome as well
Wait its finally getting translated? Lets go baby! That's what I'm talking about
Can't wait for the other 4 to be translated

Short and to-the-point, Yuutaro-kun should (politely yet firmly) give up on Mao, who has hooked up with someone else, and get together with that Sexy Onee-san that is Kana-nee.

Do Not Resist ... It Is Your Destiny!

@sakuraifuu - While I totally respect the opinions of internet strangers, imma just say naw to that one. I did translate some of the SFX, just not most of the voiced parts, since the raw amount of them in this particular chapter was quite high, and they were all basically the same thing. I did clean / redraw the text in a few places where re-drawing was easy or not necessary at all, but there's a limit to how much time you can spend on one chapter for so little gain. I can understand your point of view on these points, but for someone working solo, they add a lot of work for not that huge of an improvement in quality. In summary, "eat my short dick lmao"

Stop being lazy.
1. Translate the SFX
2. Clean the Japanese text. Don't just use blurry effect.
5/10. Could've been a 7 or 8 but you're lazy.

And we're back with another spicykestrel vanilla special! This time we've got playful big tiddie onee-chan, complete with lap pillow! There are 6 chapters in the set, as well as some one-shots of other stuff; I'm planning on doing all of them, and I'd already done one of the one-shots a while ago. So expect 5 more chapters of this in the future while I wait for more chapters of naked apron imouto to be released ;) Also, I've been told that someone's working on decensoring this... we'll see how that goes!
